duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage all phases of plant operations including production, materials, quality control, maintenance, logistic, daily P&L, R&D, purchasing/procurement, finance/accounting, and customer-related sales.
Track operating efficiencies, manage labor expenditures and continuously improve production through various lean manufacturing methodologies.
Instill a commitment to 100% on-time delivery, implement and improve corporate and facility quality management systems, and consistently reduce annual PPM rate.
Identify new business opportunities, visit existing customers, manage P&L to achieve budgets and forecasts, and work in conjunction with the beverage group VP of Business Development.
Demonstrate leadership to maintain an accident-free facility, and ensure inventory is maintained with a focus on 8 turns annually.
Ensure all BOM are up to date and accurate, specify new material requirements, and negotiate with raw material suppliers to maintain a positive costing position.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred. Engineering background preferred.
